answerText: Saladin [or Salah ad-Din Yusuf ibn Ayyub][10] The Ring Parable is told by Filomena on the first day in this work by Giovanni Bocaccio, a collection of 100 stories told over ten days by ten people fleeing the plague in Florence.

question: Question: This character is wary of Melchidezek fairly lending enough money to cover the shortfall in his treasury. For 10 points each: [10] Name this character who asks Melchidezek which of the three monotheistic religions is the true word of God and hears the Ring Parable in return. In the Divine Comedy, this ruler stands apart from everyone else in Limbo.
